column1: #Text=Marcy Kahan ( born 4 July ) is a British playwright and radio dramatist , who is half- Canadian and half- American . [ 1 ] [ 2 ]
#Text=She is a prolific author of urbane comedies for the BBC .
#Text=She was born in Montreal , educated at Somerville College , Oxford and trained in theatre in Paris with the Lecoq School teachers , Philippe Gaulier and Monika Pagneux .
#Text=20 Cigarettes National Youth Theatre , Soho Theatre 2007
